text: I have a large several hudred thousand lines text file.
I have to extract 30,000 specific lines that are all in the text file in random spots.
This is the program I have to extract one line at a time:

code:
big_file = open('C:\\gbigfile.txt', 'r')
small_file3 = open('C:\\small_file3.txt', 'w')
for line in big_file:
   if 'S0414' in line:
      small_file3.write(line)
gbigfile.close()
small_file3.close()

text: How can I speed this up for 30,000 lines that I need to look up>?
